InstructionData.Title: Combustion Centerfuge
InstructionData.Author: SMiLeY.NET
InstructionData.Instructions:
alias cc db alias alert d0
init: s alert On 1 j setup
setup: yield s cc On 1 s cc Open 1 s cc CombustionLimiter 0 s cc Throttle 0 l r10 cc Reagents bgt r10 2 setup l r11 cc Stress bgt r11 0 setup s cc Open 0 bdns alert startup s alert On 0 j startup
startup: yield s cc On 1 s cc Throttle 10 s cc CombustionLimiter 10 l r0 cc Rpm blt r0 250 startup s cc Throttle 20 s cc CombustionLimiter 20 l r0 cc Rpm blt r0 280 startup s cc Throttle 40 s cc CombustionLimiter 40 l r0 cc Rpm blt r0 340 startup s cc Throttle 60 s cc CombustionLimiter 60 l r0 cc Rpm blt r0 425 startup s cc Throttle 80 s cc CombustionLimiter 80 l r0 cc Rpm blt r0 470 startup s cc Throttle 100 s cc CombustionLimiter 100 l r0 cc Rpm blt r0 470 startup j main
main: yield l r10 cc Reagents blt r10 500 main j shutdown
shutdown: yield s cc Throttle 0 s cc CombustionLimiter 0 l r0 cc Rpm bgt r0 5 shutdown s alert On 1 j setup
